languages.text: {n}Злоба разочаровано шипит:{/n} "Ты был{mf||а} интерес{mf|ен|на} так недолго, людишко. Не расстраивай меня, я очень не люблю непоследовательность".
{n}Malice hisses in disappointment.{/n} "You have been interesting for a pitifully short time, humanling. Do not displease me again. I detest fickleness."
languages.original_text: {n}Злоба разочаровано шипит:{/n} "Ты был{mf||а} интерес{mf|ен|на} так недолго, людишко. Не расстраивай меня, я очень не люблю непоследовательность".

{n}Malice hisses in disappointment.{/n} "You have been interesting for a pitifully short time, humanling. Do not displease me again. I detest fickleness."

languages.text: {n}恶棍发出了失望的嘶叫声。{/n}“你让我感兴趣的时间实在是短得可怜，小人儿。别再惹我生气了，我不喜欢变化无常的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Malice hisses in disappointment.{/n} "You have been interesting for a pitifully short time, humanling. Do not displease me again. I detest fickleness."

traits.locale_text: {n}恶棍发出了失望的嘶叫声。{/n}“你让我感兴趣的时间实在是短得可怜，小人儿。别再惹我生气了，我不喜欢变化无常的人。”

languages.text: {n}マリスは失望したかのように蛇の鳴き声を放った。{/n}「一瞬でも面白いと思ったが興覚めだ、人間よ。気まぐれに付き合う暇はない」
languages.original_text: {n}Malice hisses in disappointment.{/n} "You have been interesting for a pitifully short time, humanling. Do not displease me again. I detest fickleness."

traits.locale_text: {n}マリスは失望したかのように蛇の鳴き声を放った。{/n}「一瞬でも面白いと思ったが興覚めだ、人間よ。気まぐれに付き合う暇はない」

languages.text: {n}Malicia sisea, decepcionado.{/n} «Solo me has resultado interesante durante un instante, human{mf|o|a}. No vuelvas a defraudarme. Detesto la veleidad».
languages.original_text: {n}Malice hisses in disappointment.{/n} "You have been interesting for a pitifully short time, humanling. Do not displease me again. I detest fickleness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malicia sisea, decepcionado.{/n} «Solo me has resultado interesante durante un instante, human{mf|o|a}. No vuelvas a defraudarme. Detesto la veleidad».

languages.text: {n}Démon laisse échapper un sifflement de déception.{/n} « Vous n'êtes pas {mf|resté intéressant|restée intéressante} bien longtemps, {mf|humain|humaine}. Ne me mécontentez plus. L'inconstance me fait horreur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Malice hisses in disappointment.{/n} "You have been interesting for a pitifully short time, humanling. Do not displease me again. I detest fickleness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Démon laisse échapper un sifflement de déception.{/n} « Vous n'êtes pas {mf|resté intéressant|restée intéressante} bien longtemps, {mf|humain|humaine}. Ne me mécontentez plus. L'inconstance me fait horreur. »

languages.text: {n}Tücke faucht enttäuscht.{/n} "Ihr wart eine enttäuschend kurze Zeit interessant, Menschling. Verärgert mich nicht noch einmal. Ich verabscheue Wankelmut."
languages.original_text: {n}Malice hisses in disappointment.{/n} "You have been interesting for a pitifully short time, humanling. Do not displease me again. I detest fickleness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tücke faucht enttäuscht.{/n} "Ihr wart eine enttäuschend kurze Zeit interessant, Menschling. Verärgert mich nicht noch einmal. Ich verabscheue Wankelmut."

languages.text: {n}Melanet, düş kırıklığını tıslayarak yansıtıyor.{/n} "İlginçliğin hayli kısa sürdü insancık. Canımı tekrar sıkma sakın. Döneklikten hiç hazzetmem."
languages.original_text: {n}Malice hisses in disappointment.{/n} "You have been interesting for a pitifully short time, humanling. Do not displease me again. I detest fickleness."
